text:
"6teen" was an American-Canadian-French animated television series produced by Nelvana, Fresh TV and Cartoon Network Studios. The show was about six sixteen-year-old friends and followed them in their first part-time jobs and teenage lives. The series premiered airs at 4:00 p.m. ET/PT times on October 23, 2008 on Cartoon Network in the United States.
The show had 95 episodes, 2 45-minute-long specials and a total of 4 season.
